newsitem.title: USA: PRESS DIGEST - Daily Variety - October 4.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - Daily Variety - October 4.

text.p: The following stories were reported in Thursday's Daily Variety:
HOLLYWOOD - Germany's Kirch Group has agreed to make a 7.5 percent investment worth more than $60 million in Arnon Milchan's New Regency Productions.
HOLLYWOOD - Michael Rosenfeld, who left his post at ABC Entertainment of Walt Disney Co last month, has joined Brillstein-Grey Entertainment as senior vice president.

HOLLYWOOD - Warner Bros International Television Productions of Time Warner Inc and the Wolper Organization are partnering to produce a slate of television movies and mini-series for the international market.
